arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland debut 'a long time coming' for Dunne
arts.sum: Republic of Ireland defender Jimmy Dunne says his debut for his country "feels like a long time coming".

arts.ttl: Evan Ferguson ignored the critics during his goal drought
arts.sum: The 20-year-old has made only a handful of appearances as a substitute for West Ham.

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland see off Bulgaria to preserve Nations League status
arts.sum: Evan Ferguson scored his first goal since November as the Republic of Ireland preserved their Nations League B status with a 4-2 aggregate victory over Bulgaria.

arts.ttl: Evan Ferguson on target as Republic of Ireland hit back to beat Bulgaria again
arts.sum: Valentin Antov had fired the visitors ahead at the Aviva Stadium.

arts.ttl: Latest score: Republic of Ireland vs Bulgaria - Nations League play-off
arts.sum: Updates as the Republic of Ireland are aiming to remain in Nations League B as they face Bulgaria in the second leg of their play-off in Dublin.

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland vs. Bulgaria team news: Starting lineups confirmed for UEFA Nations League game
arts.sum: Republic of Ireland and Bulgaria announce their starting lineups for the second leg of their UEFA Nations League playoff in Dublin.

arts.ttl: FAI send ‘deliver on commitment’ message to Government regarding League of Ireland academy funding
arts.sum: FAI CEO David Courell has made a fresh call to the Irish Government to come good on their Programme for Government pledge to support the development of academies at League of Ireland clubs. In their Programme for Government, it was stated that the incoming administration would ‘explore new mechanisms for the creation of football academies with the FAI and the League of Ireland.’

arts.ttl: FAI report 'racist incident' at Under-17 match to UEFA
arts.sum: The FAI released a statement on the matter saying: "The comment was reported to the match officials at the time and the players immediately made Republic of Ireland U17 Head Coach Colin O'Brien aware of the incident. Under-17 head coach Colin O'Brien said he fully supports the escalation of the incident: "Racism has no place in the game at any level and no-one should be subjected to any form of abuse.

arts.ttl: How to watch Republic of Ireland vs Bulgaria: TV channel and live stream for Nations League playoff
arts.sum: Heimir Hallgrímsson’s side secured a positive result in the play-off first leg

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland v Bulgaria: All you need to know
arts.sum: Watch Republic of Ireland v Bulgaria in the UEFA Nations League on Sunday from 7pm on RTÉ2 and RTÉ Player. Thursday's Nations League play-off first leg wasn't a perfect performance from Ireland but a win's a win .
